## ErrorFor type

Get error message for an invalid module type

**Signature:**

```typescript
type ErrorFor<T> = T extends Transient ? TransientError : AsyncError;
```
**References:** [Transient](../transient/)<!-- -->, [TransientError](../transienterror/)<!-- -->, [AsyncError](../asyncerror/)
